GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v4.9.331
GSD.description:
firmware: google: Test spinlock on panic path to avoid lockups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit 55ced28cac85e2fda63f25d45641c95acbbd07b0, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 74c5b31c6618f01079212332b2e5f6c42f2d6307. For more details please see the references link.
